attributes.action: MP's should only do one job and not be allowed to do any other works whilst working as an MP
attributes.additional_details:
MP's should only do one job and not be allowed to do any other works whilst working as an MP. They are voted in as an MP and should only be allowed to do one job only.

The voters are getting fed up with watching MP's make a small fortune whilst us the hard workers get nothing. Its time for change and the MP's must follow what the people want. We the people want a proper public vote on this.
